cab.content: TELEGRAM from the Governor General of Canada to theSecretary of State for the Colonies.(Received Colonial Office 8.45.p.rn. 11 th September,1919") .Urgent September 11thGovernment of Canada expect vote will "be taken this evening in House of Commons on resolu-tion approving treaty of Peace. Order in Council advising ratification in respect of Dominion of Canada will be passed and telegraphed to you as soon as possible thereafter,
